name: Dragon AK
description: On top of the list of best gun skins in Free Fire is Dragon AK. This is the most popular skin among Free Fire players. It is also the hardest skin to get in Free Fire. This legendary gun skin doubles the fire rate of the weapon, increases the damage and stability but does not meddle with the range of the weapon. Dragon AK skin can be obtained through New Year events.

name: Black Widow Ocean (Famas)
description: Among the top gun skins in Free Fire, Black widow ocean skin is the best skin that improves the ability of the Famas gun. Similar to Dragon AK, Black Widow Ocean gives the Famas gun improvements of double fire rate, increased damage, and decreased magazine capacity.

name: Venom M4A1
description: Venom M4A1 gives your weapon the same improvements as Dragon AK and Black Widow Ocean, which increases the fire rate of your weapon by twice and increase damage as well. This skin can be acquired from the Cataclysm Set with a price of 40 diamonds.

name: Vampire (Famas)
description: Vampire skin is another Famas gun skin among the best skins in Free Fire you should have. This skin improves your gun by doubling the damage, increasing magazine capacity, but it also decreases the range of the gun. You have to spend 40 diamonds to obtain this skin from the Phantom Assassin Set.

name: Ultimate Titan Scar
description: If you are searching for the best scar skins in Free Fire, Ultimate Titan Scar is the best choice for you. This skin not only enhances your weapon’s look by giving bright green fluorescent finish to the gun but also doubles the fire rate and increases the damage.

name: Blood Moon scar
description: One of the most lethal gun skins in Free Fire is Blood Moon Scar. By using this skin, your gun will have the damage doubled and the range increased. The only downside of the Blood Moon scar is that it reduces the accuracy of the weapon, so you should consider using it in some cases.

name: Cupid scar
description: Like Ultimate titan scar, Cupid scar will double the fire rate of your weapon and increase the damage of each shot. However, the range of the weapon will be reduced. Generally, Cupid scar is still one of the favorite scar skins in Free Fire because along with the improvements for your weapon, it also gives your gun a very adorable appearance with heart patterns and a mix of white

name: Mighty Fist
description: This is the second fist skin that came out in Free Fire. This is quite a special skin in the sense that it’s part of the Free Fire and One Punch Man collaboration. The game comes up with brand new exciting events every month. The skin resembles the glove Saitama wears, the protagonist of the anime. The skin came in the Faded Wheel event this January.

name: Cobra Fist
description: The third to follow in line, the Cobra fist skin is, again, a part of a huge event in Free Fire that took place in February this year. The Cobra event offered a lot of goodies such as the Cobra Rage bundle, new themed emotes, etc. Talking about the skin, the fist depicts the fangs of a lethal cobra. Blood red-painted all over the fist, which renders it quite attractive. This skin was also released in the Faded Wheel event around the ending of February.

name: K.O. Fist
description: A part of the K.O. event held in April. This skin is quite different from the earlier ones in terms of possessing a totally different appearance and animations. The purple color shade coupled with the lightening effects gives it a very cool look. The skin was made available in the Faded Wheel shop, and surprisingly, didn’t cost much when most of the player base tried out its luck.

name: Hailstone Fist
description: This is rather one of the most awaited skins yet to come in the Indian server. Though, it’s available on a few other servers including the North America server. This skin is the polar negative of the OG Flaming Fist in terms of appearance. Chill light blue-colored skin with icy cool looks and a sound effect that differs from the other ones. The player base hopes the skin gets available across all the servers soon!

name: Flaming Dragon AK
description: Dragon AK is one of the famous and powerful ARs in Free Fire. It is also one of the rarest and desired gun skins in the game. The skin comes in the list of Legendary gun skins. The ability of the skin increases the damage rate of the gun as well as doubles the fire rate of the gun. The players who will use it will get increased stability.

name: Pumpkin Flames Ak
description: The ability of the gun skin is that it has a special kill feed message with an increased fire rate and with doubled accuracy. Players can also flaunt this gun animation in the game lobby. They can buy the gun skin at the in-game store for 40 diamonds.

name: M1014 Apocalyptic Green
description: M1014 Apocalyptic Green is one of the rarest and highly desired gun skin ever in Free Fire. Players will have a special advantage while using this because it increases the fire rate and the range at the same time. The reloading speed of the gun is slow which is quite disturbing. Players can use this skin for long-range fights instead of using the M1887 shotgun.

name: Great Plunder Groza
description: This is one of the best Groza skins available in Free Fire. The Great Plunder Groza is available in the store section of Free Fire and can be bought for 40 diamonds. This skin doubles the accuracy and increases the damage of the Groza. It also contains a specialized kill feed during the game.

name: Rebel Academy P90
description: This is one the most viable skins which can be used with a P90 gun in Free Fire. It doubles the damage and increases the range of the gun, making it lethal during close and mid-quarter combat. Players can buy it from the store for 40 diamonds.

name: Tropical Parrot M1887
description: The M1887 is deadly itself, and now with this skin, it’s gotten even more lethal. This shotgun was introduced a few months ago and it became an instant hit among the players. It’s so because of its insane range and firepower. This skin offers an accuracy boost which does help but is hardly noticeable.
